Posted By: touchdown (9/29/2009 3:09:56 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Another random thing she stops cold is Darksteel Reactor, and most of the modular creatures. She can also keep persist creatures alive if you wanted to.
  
   
A 2/1 firststrike body for 2 black, with the bonus ability to wipe out planeswalkers, 5/5.
  
   
Turn one play Forest, cast Sakura-Tribe Scout.
  
Turn two play Twilight Mire, tap for 2 black cast Vampire Hexmage.
  
Any time during your opponent's turn 2 you can tap the scout to instantly put Dark Depths into play, and instant sac Hexmage to bring out the 20/20 indestructible flyer to block a Darksteel Colossus even.
  
Turn three, attack with the 20/20 flyer.
posts.html:
Another random thing she stops cold is Darksteel Reactor, and most of the modular creatures. She can also keep persist creatures alive if you wanted to.

A 2/1 firststrike body for 2 black, with the bonus ability to wipe out planeswalkers, 5/5.

Turn one play Forest, cast Sakura-Tribe Scout.
Turn two play Twilight Mire, tap for 2 black cast Vampire Hexmage.
Any time during your opponent's turn 2 you can tap the scout to instantly put Dark Depths into play, and instant sac Hexmage to bring out the 20/20 indestructible flyer to block a Darksteel Colossus even.
Turn three, attack with the 20/20 flyer.

Posted By: sir_dwar (9/26/2009 6:56:17 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
She puts a damper on quests and stops Planeswalkers and Hydras outright. She deals with things that make heavy use of +1/+1 counters, like Allies, [Scute Mob](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scute Mob), [Ob Nixilis, The Fallen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ob Nixilis, The Fallen), and [Mycoloth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mycoloth). She makes [Eternity Vessel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eternity Vessel), and [Sigil of Distinction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sigil of Distinction) useless.  
  
As an added bonus, she's a decently powered creature.
posts.html:
She puts a damper on quests and stops Planeswalkers and Hydras outright. She deals with things that make heavy use of +1/+1 counters, like Allies, Scute Mob, Ob Nixilis, The Fallen, and Mycoloth. She makes Eternity Vessel, and Sigil of Distinction useless.

As an added bonus, she's a decently powered creature.

Posted By: Batstewart (10/24/2009 9:12:27 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Wow! If you are a vintage player like myself, you are gonna fall in love for a short time and get real bored out of your skull with that hot little shorty (yes... she's gonna be in all your black decks because she's just that strong!! For those who are not convinced, you will be soon enough, no matter how stubborn you could be). She's the best thing that came out since "Power Artifact + Grim Monolith", Tinker or Channel to my opinion. Allright, I'm not gonna say anything that has'nt been said yet so, here goes:
  
   
1. Dark Depths is a land, so it comes in free and Vampire Hexmage is 2 black mana to cast and her ability does'nt require her to tap which makes it avoid the "summoning sickness" rule in regards to her ability. Now, that's some pretty cheap explosive material and everybody knows that.
  
   
2. Next, you are going to create an explosive device to make this 20/20 bomb material explode on turn one... See where I'm getting at? Fling will do the trick! Soul's fire will keep the flame... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
